definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: What does pop music do for us that's very helpful?
sentences.chinese: 就這點而言流行音樂對我們來說有什麼用處呢？

sentences.english: All of them have their uses when tunning a memory-hungry program.
sentences.chinese: 當調整渴求內存的程序時它們各有用處。

sentences.english: What is the use of worrying?
She was driven from pillar to post. Each person she spoke to was more unhelpful than the last.
sentences.chinese: 她四處奔走，和她談話的人一個不如一個有用處。

sentences.english: What is the use of that wire which he has fastened there?
sentences.chinese: 他拴在那裏的那根鋼絲繩有什麼用處了？

sentences.english: Here reingly are seven of its tearfully - pleasing uses.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是它的7種令你含淚帶笑的用處。

sentences.english: The check out assistant at my usual supermarket is always rude and unhelpful.
sentences.chinese: 我經常去的超市的收銀員總是很粗魯而且沒多大用處。

sentences.english: This, as I say, is a different use of close reading.
sentences.chinese: 這也是細讀研究的另一種用處。

sentences.english: Some samples of Occam's discussions may be useful.
sentences.chinese: 奧卡姆議論中的某些例證可能有些用處。

sentences.english: It is pants of a bottom, a piece of lavatory paper , have its use.
sentences.chinese: 就算是一條底褲，一張廁紙，都有它的用處。

sentences.english: These items give us the fantasy of safety and wellbeing, and little else.
sentences.chinese: 這些東西給我們除了健康和安全的幻想幾乎毫無用處。

sentences.english: OK, this is actually a pretty good troll.
sentences.chinese: 好吧這確實是非常的有用處。

sentences.english: Give me back nine pounds, Jane; I've a use for it.
sentences.chinese: 把五鎊還給我，簡，我要派用處。

sentences.english: They could have been as useless out and very impolitely took the chalk out of my sister's hand.
sentences.chinese: 我的腳對我來說完全可能和我的手一樣沒有用處。

sentences.english: And he cast four rings for the four ends of the grate of brass， to be places for the staves.
sentences.chinese: 爲銅網的四角鑄四個環子，作爲穿槓的用處。

definition: difference/to distinguish/to discriminate/to make a distinction/CL:個|个[ge4]
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
